ARABIC: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they are told to bow, they do not bow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When it is said to them: "Bow in homage," they do not bow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When it is said to them: “Bow down (before Allah),” they do not bow down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When they are told to say their prayers, they do not bow down (in prayer).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when it is said to them, “Offer the prayer” – they do not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when it is said to them: "Bow down yourself!" They bow not down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And where it is said to them: Bow down, they do not bow down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When it is said to them, 'Prostrate yourselves!' they prostrate not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When it is said unto them: Bow down, they bow not down!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When they are bidden to bow down, they do not bow down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when it is said Unto them: 'bow down, they bow not down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When they are told, ‘Bow down [in prayer],’ they do not bow down!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate yourselves!" they do not so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when it is said to them: "Bow down yourself (in prayer)!" They bow not down (offer not their prayers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When it is said to them: 'Bow yourselves' they do not bow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when it is said to them, “Kneel”, they do not kneel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:48] For when it is said to them, ‘Bow down!’, perform prayer, they do not bow down, they do not perform prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When it is said unto them) to the disbelievers when they were in the life of the world: (Bow down) submit to Allah by believing in His divine Oneness, (they bow not down!) they did not submit to Allah by accepting His divine Oneness; it is also said that they will be asked to do so in the Hereafter, when Allah will say to them: "bow down, if you are truthful that you believed in that which you now claim", this is because they said: "By Allah, our Lord, we were not idolaters". But they will not be able to bow down and their bodies will remain erect and stiff. It is also said that this verse was revealed about Thaqif who said: "we will not bend down to bow or prostrate".
